attributes.action: Review the decision to close and archive the recipes on the BBC website
attributes.additional_details: The story about the website closing is here among other places: http://www.theguardian.com/media/2016/may/17/online-recipes-off-the-menu-of-slimmed-down-bbc  The BBC's mission is here: http://www.bbc.co.uk/corporate2/insidethebbc/whoweare/mission_and_values
attributes.background: It has been reported that the recipes on the BBC website are to be closed. The recipes provide an easy and free resource that help many cook nutritious meals.  This is directly inline with the BBC's mission: "To enrich people's lives with programmes and services that inform, educate and entertain."

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the BBC. The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.
